overview: You've got a new lucky number. Barely Legal #18, the latest, steamiest volume in the red-hot series, is crammed full of tempting teens who just happen to have reached those long-awaited digits themselves. Come celebrate with the happy birthday babes as they finally receive the gift of cock in their tight, law-abiding pussies. Share in their joy as they stuff their newly adult mouths with sweetmeats and lick up all the icing. The girls of Barely Legal #18 are the perfect age: Old enough to be bad, but young enough for a spanking.
tagline: We're Finally Old Enough For You
title: Barely Legal 18
